title: Pepiliyana Sunethra Devi Pirivena builds seven storied Bikku Hostel
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Chandana Perera – The newly built seven storied building for Bikku hostel of the Sunethra Devi Pirivena in Pepiliyana was vested in the Bikku community this afternoon (10 October) under the patronage of President Mahinda Rajapaksa. The new hostel will accommodate student bikkus from different parts of the…
